name: Gang Racers
description:
Start a high-stakes city race full of dangerous enemies from the mafia! Can you defeat all of the enemies and dangers coming at you and stay in one piece? You will have to use your reflexes and quick aiming skills to survive an open road gang fight!

Features:
- Multiple varied enemies to meet on the road and fight
- Powerful mob bosses for the ultimate test of strength and skill
- Varied attack patterns to avoid - use the enemy bombs or grenades against them!
- Exciting surprises - take part in bullet-time shootouts, find weak points of your enemies

On the road you will meet multiple varied cars and other vehicles from the mafia. Engage in exciting city road shootouts with sports cars, muscle cars, SUVs, jeeps, quads and more! Shoot down drones, hit exploding barrels for maximum damage!

Aim carefully for the biggest impact. Each enemy car has its localised damage and bullet impact points. Be observant and watch to use their cargo against them!

Multiple camera views changing through the levels keep the gameplay exciting and varied.

For your progress unlock powerful upgrades that will help you become an unstoppable force. Become the ultimate road warrior!
